halfQuarterWholeConcepts.no_pizza_butun: No, the pizza is not whole.
halfQuarterWholeConcepts.no_pizza_yarim: No, the pizza is not half.
halfQuarterWholeConcepts.yes_pizza_dilimi_ceyrek: Yes, this is a quarter pizza.
halfQuarterWholeConcepts.no_pizza_dilimi_ceyrek: No, this is not a quarter pizza.
halfQuarterWholeConcepts.no_portakal_butun: No, the orange is not whole.

halfQuarterWholeConcepts.no_simit_yarim: No, the bagel is not half.
halfQuarterWholeConcepts.no_pasta_butun: No, the cake is not whole.
